felipe.name: Felipe Aragão Pires
felipe.bio: Felipe is a rising sophomore, majoring in Computer Science and Economics. He currently serves as Tech and Media Chair for the BCY. Felipe is interested in ways of bringing the Computer Science closer to the humanities. On campus, he is part of the Liberal Party and works as a Student Developer.
